usage.cn: 离开我就别安慰我，要知道每一次缝补也会遭遇穿刺的痛。
usage.eng: If you leave me, please don't comfort me because each sewing has to meet stinging pain.

usage.cn: 在我们生命中出现的人，一些给我们上课，一些让我们痊愈，有的用来分担分享，有的用来真爱。
usage.eng: Among those people that appear in our life, some are to teach us, some to comfort us, some to share and some to love.
